content.text:
# Monument to the Revolution of 1905

| website       =
| extra_label   =
| extra         =
}}
Memorial to the Revolution of 1905 in Tallinn, Estonia, is a public monument erected to commemorate the events of the Revolution of 1905. The only writing upon the monument is the date of "1905", in a similar manner to its counterpart in Riga, Latvia.
References
External links
* Lauri Vahtre, [http://www.postimees.ee/181005/esileht/arvamus/180393.php Töölisnaine, Tammsaare ja maasse imbunud veri], Postimees, 18. oktoober 2005
* Heie Treier, [https://web.archive.org/web/20070806073858/http://www.opera.ee/24686 Linnaruumi võitmine: Estonia teatri monumendikonkurss], 12. mai 2006
